text: Roberto Cabral del Hoyo (August 7, 1913 - October 4, 1999) was a Mexican poet, historian, and writer. He was known for his written works Filly Pearl, To My Roots of the Earth, Three, Against the Dark Wind, and Word. Hoyo was born on August 7, 1913 in Zacatecas, Zacatecas, Mexico. He was never married and had no children. Hoyo died on October 4, 1999 from pneumonia in his hometown and were he lived in Zacatecas, Mexico, aged 86. ==Other websites== Category:1913 births Category:1999 deaths Category:Deaths from pneumonia Category:Mexican writers Category:Mexican historians Category:Mexican poets Category:People from Zacatecas
title: Roberto Cabral del Hoyo
